item.title: About
item.description: Master’s degree in Graphic Design at the HEAR (Haute École des Arts du Rhin), Strasbourg June 2019 Exchange semester at the Willem de Kooning Academy, Rotterdam, Graphic Design department August 2017 to February 2018 Bachelor in Graphic Design at the HEAR, Strasbourg June 2017 Internship ⇾ (Team) Alexis Zurflüh, Munich 16 July - 28 September 2018 Editorial design and video making Visual communication for Is this you in the video?

item.title: À propos
